___name.x-prompt: What should be the name of the action?

___creators.x-prompt: Do you want to use the create function?
___creators.description: Specifies whether to use creator functions for handling actions and reducers.

___skipTest.description: When true, does not create test files.

___api.x-prompt: Should we generate success and failure actions?
___api.description: Specifies if api success and failure actions should be generated.

___flat.description: Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

___path.description: The path to create the component.
